summary:
Now with FIXED SKULL HELM and optional non-enchanted ESP
Plus SOUL DEVOUR ENCHANT.  Also 3 versions for Frostmourne (6 with non-enchanted ESP)
1 Handed Frostmourne
2 Handed Frostmourne
2 Handed Frostmourne Special (Allows the use of shields)
descriptionHtml:
WORK IS BEING DISCONTINUED ON THIS MOD, Please visit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/addfile/?id=25696 for future updates with Bigger and Badder Lich King, Collectors edition.  Will be adding a team to this MOD to perfect it.

Currently testing out a theory that requires me Make this MOD into new file

Changes with the Collectors edition include
New item names, 
The Bigger Belted version is the defualt and I did not like the item discription.  Smaller belted item is now labled as such.

Also everything can now be found under the DragonArmor/Plate of the Damned Smithing perk.  Much more lore friendly, crafting requirements are actually harder now and you need 100% smithing to make this.  Frostmourne will require \"Remnants of Frostmourne\" to craft.
author: LuciferX10
